page.title: 01Recreation-The Swimming Gala
page.content: On Friday July 5th we had our swimming gala.The swimming pool is located outside our D-Block so we cannot include it in our survey count.Twelve schools entered.It was in the afternoon and ten pupils were entered with two reserves.We all went down in cars.We arrived at half past one but the gala did not start until two o'clock.There were a lot of good swimmers there.The girls relay team came second in the finals.Out of all the schools our school came third. We were all very pleased.The Lady Mayoress presented us with the medallions and the shield.
